index.name: allowedRolesAndUsers
index.description: The roles and users with View permission on an item

index.name: created
index.description: The time and date an item was created

index.name: Date
index.description: The time and date an item was last modified

index.name: effective
index.description: The time and date an item becomes publicly available

index.name: effectiveRange
index.description: All items publicly available on a certain date

index.name: end
index.description: The end date and time of an event

index.name: expires
index.description: The time and date an item is no longer publicly available

index.name: getId
index.description: The short name of an item (used in the url)

index.name: getObjPositionInParent
index.description: The order of an item in its parent folder

index.name: getRawRelatedItems
index.description: Find items related to the selected items

index.name: id
index.description: The short name of an item (used in the url)

index.name: is_default_page
index.description: Find items that are the default view for their containing folder.

index.name: is_folderish
index.description: Find items that can contain other objects

index.name: modified
index.description: The time and date an item was last modified

index.name: path
index.description: The location of an item in the site (path)

index.name: review_state
index.description: An item's workflow state (e.g.published)

index.name: SearchableText
index.description: Text search of an item's contents

index.name: sortable_title
index.description: An item's title transformed for sorting

index.name: start
index.description: The start date and time of an event

index.name: Subject
index.description: The keywords used to describe an item

index.name: Title
index.description: Text search of an item's title

index.name: Type
index.description: An item's type (e.g. Event)
